        Sets the root data model at the first argument and returns the localized subject of the mail
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getPlainMailMaps

        public static java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,FieldChange> getPlainMailMaps(java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,FieldChange> allFieldChangesMap,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> longFields,
                                                                  java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                  boolean isNew)
        Builds the text for plain email in two Maps. The first map (modifying the first argument): removes the long field FieldChanges The second map (the return value): builds a map for long fields from the FieldChanges removed from the allFieldChangesMap map Sets the localized change detail texts if changed for both short and long fields
        Parameters:
        allFieldChangesMap - Map with FieldChanges for both short and long values. It is also an "out" parameter
        longFields - the fieldIDs for longer texts (description, comment).
        locale -
        isNew - whether creating a new issue (isCreate || isCopy) or editing an existing one
        Returns:

      • getHTMLMailMaps

        public static java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,FieldChange> getHTMLMailMaps(java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,FieldChange> allFieldChangesMap,
                                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> longFields,
                                                                 java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                 boolean isNew)
        Builds the text for HTML email in two Maps. The first map (modifying the first argument): removes the long field FieldChanges The second map (the return value): builds a map for long fields from the FieldChanges removed from the allFieldChangesMap map, and sets the localized change detail texts for them (in HTML mail the short fields does not need change detail texts)
        Parameters:
        allFieldChangesMap - Map with FieldChanges for both short and long values. It is also an "out" parameter
        longFields - the fieldIDs for longer texts (description, comment).
        locale -
        isNew - whether creating a new issue (isCreate || isCopy) or editing an existing one
        Returns:
